titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House and Senate from May 21 to May 27, 1987.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 5/20/1987--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives and of the Senate from May 21 until May 27, 1987.
